mean_cn: n. 对讲机，内部通话装置
mean_en: a system which allows a person speaking into a microphone to be heard on a speaker by people in a different room or area
word_etyma: inter 互相 + com通话 → 对讲机；内部通话装置
sentence: The plumber called me on the intercom so I could press the button and let him in.
sentence_trans: 管子工用内部通话装置给我打了电话，所以我就可以按键放他进来。
